descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This is a continuation of the honors seminar. Students will be mostly working on their projects. We will meet to discuss challenges, and to present he projects to each other.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Must be enrolled in the PS honors program

descriptions.name: Learning Objectives
descriptions.value: Students are expected to have a draft of their honors thesis by the end of the term.
